participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and active, enjoys staying fit and is sociable.
participant_1.background: I go to the gym regularly. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. Eating is something I do when I'm bored. I have short hair.

participant_2.name: Pink
participant_2.personality: Playful and enthusiastic, loves soccer and enjoys sharing her experiences.
participant_2.background: My favorite food is papaya. I married a super model from Italy. I have zero family that I'm close to. I am a bee farmer. My name is George.
